name: Candy Mania Quest
description:
This is a new Match 3 game created by Young Stars, the creator of "16 Squares" and "Jelly Blaster Legend" (Jelly Blast) games!

Match the cubes of the same color and combine boosters for huge explosions to blast your way through thousands of levels!

"Candy Mania Quest" is a global popular leisure and puzzle type elimination box mobile game.

Click on any 2 adjacent toy cubes of the same. Enjoy the amazing toy world in Candy Mania Quest! 

Features
- FREE GAME and NO INTERNET.
- Currently the game has 100+ levels. And more.
- Music and graphics in game are funny.
- Requests to earn fun rewards and daily reward.
- Keep progress game on server.
- Get diamond when complete each level.
- Share with friends.
- Exciting lighting effects while playing including blast mania, lighting splash, candy boom.
- Easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master.
***************************************************************************
Download Candy Mania Quest now to start your saga! Enjoy!
***************************************************************************
